akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 102–367, title VII, § 702(a)(10), Sept. 7, 1992, 106 Stat. 1112

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1591. Repealed. Pub. L. 102–367, title VII, § 702(a)(10), Sept. 7, 1992, 106 Stat. 1112
Section, Pub. L. 97–300, title I, § 181, Oct. 13, 1982, 96 Stat. 1354; Pub. L. 97–404, § 1(i), Dec. 31, 1982, 96 Stat. 2026, related to transition between the Comprehensive Employment Training Act and this chapter.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective July 1, 1993, see section 701(a) of Pub. L. 102–367, formerly set out as an Effective Date of 1992 Amendment; Transition Provisions note under section 1501 of this title.
